§ 90101. Organization(a) Federal Charter.—The Help America Vote Foundation (in this chapter, the “foundation”) is a federally chartered corporation.
(b) Nature of Foundation.—The foundation is a charitable and nonprofit corporation and is not an agency or establishment of the United States Government.
(c) Perpetual Existence.—Except as otherwise provided, the foundation has perpetual existence.
(Added Pub. L. 107–252, title VI, § 601(a), Oct. 29, 2002, 116 Stat. 1718, § 152601; renumbered § 90101, Pub. L. 113–237, § 3(c)(6)(B), Dec. 18, 2014, 128 Stat. 2840.)
Editorial Notes Amendments2014—Pub. L. 113–237 renumbered section 152601 of this title as this section.
